content.rendered:
The Tromso range of contract desking is ideal for those who prefer a minimalist, practical and Scandinavian style. 

We also offer the Tromso desk in back to back pods, joint rows, boardroom tables and more!

The Tromso Desk range comes with a 25mm thick rectangle table top made from contract grade laminate and a 2mm protective edge. Heat resistant and metal to metal fixings for total integrity. 

5 year guarantee. This item requires self assembly.
